body:
Use 'Tower of the Magistrate' to give a creature protection from artifacts.
You can then still target it with cards like 'Dragon Blood' and 'Vial of Poison'
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Given Protection from Artifacts still allows Artifact Target

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 19a2bb86395f .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on February 02, 2014 05:25:22_

Use 'Tower of the Magistrate' to give a creature protection from artifacts.
You can then still target it with cards like 'Dragon Blood' and 'Vial of Poison'

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=470_
